TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DisplayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DisplayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DisplayAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 提供允许为实体分部类的类型和成员指定可本地化字符串的通用特性。

span.span: Provides a general-purpose attribute that lets you specify localizable strings for types and members of entity partial classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的属性可用于为文本或资源标识符指定实例。The properties of this class can be used either as literals or as resource identifiers for a specified instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化， ， ，和属性为空字符串。The constructor initializes the , , , and properties to an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateField { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应自动生成用户界面以显示此字段。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether UI should be generated automatically in order to display this field.

value.span: 如果应自动生成用户界面以显示此字段，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if UI should be generated automatically to display this field; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用此属性访问属性。Do not use this property to access the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead.

exception.span: 在设置属性值之前，已尝试获取该属性值。

span.span: An attempt was made to get the property value before it was set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateFilter { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否针对此字段自动显示筛选。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether filtering UI is automatically displayed for this field.

value.span: 如果应自动生成用户界面以显示此字段的筛选，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if UI should be generated automatically to display filtering for this field; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用此属性来获取的值属性。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. 设置此属性重写用于指定哪些列作为筛选器包含的默认行为。Setting this property overrides the default behavior for specifying which columns are included as filters. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何禁用 Employee1 字段的筛选器。The following example shows how to disable the filter for the Employee1 field. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

exception.span: 在设置属性值之前，已尝试获取该属性值。

span.span: An attempt was made to get the property value before it was set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于在用户界面中显示说明。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used to display a description in the UI.

value.span: 用于在用户界面中显示说明的值。

span.span: The value that is used to display a description in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用此属性来获取的值属性。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. 属性通常用作工具提示或描述 UI 元素绑定到使用此属性的成员。The property is typically used as a tooltip or description UI element that is bound to the member using this attribute. 动态数据 Edit.ascx 模板将显示为工具提示文本输入字段中的说明。The Dynamic Data Edit.ascx template will display the description as a tooltip in text-entry fields. A`null`值或空字符串是否有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于为工具提示使用此属性批注过的属性。The property is typically used as a tooltip for the property that is annotated with this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称通常用作绑定到进行批注的属性的用户界面元素的字段标签属性。The name is typically used as the field label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with the property. A`null`值或空字符串是否有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid.

span.span: Returns the value of the property.

returns.span: 如果已设置 属性，则为该属性的值；否则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, if it has been set; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定订单，表示层应该考虑的值设置属性设置为 10000。If an order is not specified, presentation layers should consider setting the value of the property to 10000. 此值使之前和之后没有指定顺序排序的字段显示的显式排序的字段。This value lets explicitly-ordered fields be displayed before and after the fields that do not have a specified order.

returns.span: 如果已指定 属性并且 属性表示一个资源键，则获取 属性的本地化字符串；否则获取 属性的非本地化值。

span.span: Gets the localized string for the property if the property has been specified and if the property represents a resource key; otherwise, the non-localized value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用作提示或水印绑定到进行批注的属性的用户界面元素属性。The property is typically used as a prompt or watermark for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with the attribute.

span.span: Returns the value of the property.

returns.span: 如果已指定 属性并且 属性表示一个资源键，则为 属性的本地化字符串；否则为 值属性的非本地化值。

span.span: The localized string for the property if the property has been specified and if the property represents a resource key; otherwise, the non-localized value of the value property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 短名称用作网格列标签绑定到此属性的属性的用户界面元素。The short name is used as the grid column label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 此属性返回的文本、 非本地化的字符串或一个本地化的字符串，如果不`null`。This property returns either the literal, non-localized string, or a localized string if is not `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ GroupName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于在用户界面中对字段进行分组。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used to group fields in the UI.

value.span: 用于在用户界面中对字段进行分组的值。

span.span: A value that is used to group fields in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用此属性来获取的值属性。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. A`null`值或空字符串是否有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于在用户界面中进行显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used for display in the UI.

value.span: 用于在用户界面中进行显示的值。

span.span: A value that is used for display in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用此属性来获取的值属性。Do not use this property to get the value of the property. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. 名称通常用作程序绑定到此属性的属性的 UI 元素的字段标签。The name is typically used as the field label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 动态数据 List.aspx、 ListDetails.aspx 和 Details.aspx 页模板使用字段标签的属性。The Dynamic Data List.aspx, ListDetails.aspx, and Details.aspx page templates use the property for the field label. A`null`值或空字符串是否有效。A `null` value or empty string is valid. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 name 属性。The following example shows how to set the name property. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Order { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置列的排序权重。

span.span: Gets or sets the order weight of the column.
The order weight of the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列进行排序以升序基于顺序值。Columns are sorted in increasing order based on the order value. 如果没有此特性的列具有的顺序值为 0。Columns without this attribute have an order value of 0. 负值有效，并可用于将某个列之前所有的非负列放置。Negative values are valid and can be used to position a column before all non-negative columns. 如果未指定订单，表示层应考虑使用值 10000。If an order is not specified, presentation layers should consider using the value 10000. 此值使之前和之后没有指定顺序排序的字段显示的显式排序的字段。This value lets explicitly-ordered fields be displayed before and after the fields that do not have a specified order. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将姓氏字段的排序权重设置为-9。The following example shows how to set the order weight of the LastName field to -9. 实体中的其他字段具有默认排序权重为零。The other fields in the entity have the default order weight of zero. 因此，将首先显示姓氏字段。Therefore, the LastName field will be displayed first. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Prompt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值将用于为用户界面中的提示设置水印。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that will be used to set the watermark for prompts in the UI.

value.span: 将用于在用户界面中显示水印的值。

span.span: A value that will be used to display a watermark in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常作为提示或水印用于绑定到此属性的属性的 UI 元素。This property is typically used as a prompt or watermark for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 不要使用此方法来访问提示的字符串。Do not use this method to access the prompt string. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置"输入 Last Name"属性。The following example shows how to set the property to "Enter Last Name". ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(EmployeeMD))] public partial class Employee { public class EmployeeMD { [Display(Name = "Last Name", Order = -9, Prompt = "Enter Last Name", Description="Emp Last Name")] public object LastName { get; set; } [Display(Name = "Manager", AutoGenerateFilter=false)] public object Employee1 { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Employee Public Class EmployeeMD _ Public Property LastName As Object End Property _ Public Property Employee1 As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ ResourceType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含 、、 和 属性的资源的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type that contains the resources for the , , , and properties.

value.span: 包含 、、 和 属性的资源的类型。

span.span: The type of the resource that contains the , , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此值为`null`、 ， ， ，和属性都被认为是文本、 非本地化的字符串。If this value is `null`, the , , , and properties are assumed to be literal, non-localized strings. 如果此值不是`null`，对字符串属性都被认为是返回实际字符串值的公共静态属性的名称。If this value is not `null`, the string properties are assumed to be the names of public static properties that return the actual string value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShortName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于网格列标签的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used for the grid column label.
A value that is for the grid column label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 短名称用作网格列标签绑定到此属性的属性的用户界面元素。The short name is used as the grid column label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute. 动态数据 Insert.aspx 和 Edit.aspx 页模板使用字段标签。The Dynamic Data Insert.aspx and Edit.aspx page templates use the for the field label. 此属性返回的本地化的字符串如果指定属性如果属性表示的资源键。This property returns the localized string for if the property has been specified and if the property represents a resource key. 如果未指定属性或如果属性不是资源键，则此属性返回的非本地化的字符串。If the property has not been specified or if the property is not a resource key, this property returns a non-localized string.
